name: Grow Pumpkin
description:
This was a fun little project. I have always loved On's grow games. This was a good project to get more familiar with HTML5 game development (although I've been working with web technology for my whole career).

All graphics were created by me using Inkscape and Gimp. It was written using MS Code and is pure HTML5 and JavaScript.

Music provided by TP (soundation)

I hope you enjoy it!
